nodes.text: Whiforla-song was a language spoken by the avian inhabitants of Whiforla II. It consisted of complex fluting sounds, and the vocal range of the average human did not allow him or her to utter anything else than basic greetings and congratulations on a successful molting. Whiforla-song was one of the six million forms of communication in which C-3PO, a protocol droid, was fluent.
